skills.name: SELECT Fundamentals
skills.pattern: SELECT col1, col2 FROM table WHERE condition ORDER BY col LIMIT n

skills.name: JOINs
skills.pattern: INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL OUTER, CROSS JOIN - ON condition

skills.name: Aggregations
skills.pattern: COUNT, SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX, GROUP BY, HAVING

skills.name: Subqueries
skills.pattern: SELECT * FROM t WHERE col IN (SELECT col FROM t2)

skills.name: Window Functions
skills.pattern: ROW_NUMBER(), RANK(), DENSE_RANK(), LAG(), LEAD() OVER (PARTITION BY)

skills.name: CTEs
skills.pattern: WITH cte AS (SELECT ...) SELECT * FROM cte WHERE ...

skills.name: Recursive CTEs
skills.pattern: WITH RECURSIVE cte AS (base UNION ALL recursive) SELECT * FROM cte

skills.name: PIVOT/UNPIVOT
skills.pattern: Rows to columns (PIVOT), columns to rows (UNPIVOT)

skills.name: LATERAL JOIN
skills.pattern: FROM t1, LATERAL (SELECT ... WHERE t1.id = ...) t2

skills.name: MERGE/UPSERT
skills.pattern: MERGE INTO target USING source ON ... WHEN MATCHED/NOT MATCHED

skills.name: EXPLAIN ANALYZE
skills.pattern: EXPLAIN (ANALYZE, BUFFERS) SELECT ... - understand execution

skills.name: Index Types
skills.pattern: B-tree (default), Hash (equality), GIN (arrays), GiST (spatial)

skills.name: Composite Indexes
skills.pattern: CREATE INDEX idx ON t(a, b) - leftmost prefix rule

skills.name: Covering Indexes
skills.pattern: INCLUDE (col) - add columns to index for index-only scan

skills.name: Partial Indexes
skills.pattern: CREATE INDEX idx ON t(col) WHERE status = 'active'

skills.name: Query Optimization Tips
skills.pattern: Avoid SELECT *, use indexes, limit results, avoid functions on indexed cols

skills.name: N+1 Problem
skills.pattern: Use JOINs or batch queries instead of loop queries

skills.name: ACID Properties
skills.pattern: Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability

skills.name: Isolation Levels
skills.pattern: READ UNCOMMITTED, READ COMMITTED, REPEATABLE READ, SERIALIZABLE

skills.name: Deadlock Prevention
skills.pattern: Consistent ordering, short transactions, proper indexing

skills.name: Normalization
skills.pattern: 1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF - reduce redundancy

skills.name: Denormalization
skills.pattern: Strategic redundancy for read performance

skills.name: Foreign Keys
skills.pattern: REFERENCES table(col) ON DELETE CASCADE/SET NULL/RESTRICT

skills.name: Constraints
skills.pattern: NOT NULL, UNIQUE, CHECK, PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY

skills.name: PostgreSQL JSONB
skills.pattern: jsonb_col->>'key', @> containment, jsonb_agg, jsonb_set

skills.name: PostgreSQL Arrays
skills.pattern: array_agg, ANY(), ALL(), array_length, unnest

skills.name: PostgreSQL Full-Text
skills.pattern: to_tsvector, to_tsquery, @@ operator, GIN indexes

skills.name: PostgreSQL Extensions
skills.pattern: pg_trgm (fuzzy), PostGIS (spatial), uuid-ossp, pgcrypto

skills.name: Partitioning
skills.pattern: PARTITION BY RANGE/LIST/HASH - large table management

skills.name: Vacuuming
skills.pattern: VACUUM ANALYZE - reclaim space, update statistics
